template<typename Rng , typename Fun >
concept ranges::views::transformable_range
 
template<typename Rng , typename Fun >
concept ranges::views::transformable_range_ = regular_invocable<Fun &, range_reference_t<Rng>> && (!std::is_void<indirect_result_t<Fun &, iterator_t<Rng>>>::value)
 
template<typename Rng1 , typename Rng2 , typename Fun >
concept ranges::views::transformable_ranges
 
template<typename Rng1 , typename Rng2 , typename Fun >
concept ranges::views::transformable_ranges_ = regular_invocable<Fun &, range_reference_t<Rng1>, range_reference_t<Rng2>> && (!std::is_void< indirect_result_t<Fun &, iterator_t<Rng1>, iterator_t<Rng2>>>::value)

◆ transformable_range

template<typename Rng , typename Fun >
concept ranges::views::transformable_range
Initial value:
=
viewable_range<Rng> && input_range<Rng> &&
copy_constructible<Fun> &&
views::transformable_range_ < Rng, Fun >

◆ transformable_ranges

template<typename Rng1 , typename Rng2 , typename Fun >
concept ranges::views::transformable_ranges
Initial value:
=
viewable_range<Rng1> && input_range<Rng1> &&
viewable_range<Rng2> && input_range<Rng2> &&
copy_constructible<Fun> &&
views::transformable_ranges_ < Rng1, Rng2, Fun >
